text.*:
As a member of the EFTA, Switzerland (CH) is included in the Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS). The three NUTS levels are:

  • NUTS-1: Switzerland
  • NUTS-2: 7 Regions
  • NUTS-3: 26 Cantons

The NUTS codes are as follows:

CH0 Switzerland
CH01 Lake Geneva region
CH011  Vaud
CH012  Valais
CH013  Geneva
CH02 Espace Mittelland
CH021  Berne
CH022  Fribourg
CH023  Solothurn
CH024  Neuchâtel
CH025  Jura
CH03 Northwestern Switzerland
CH031  Basel-Stadt
CH032  Basel-Landschaft
CH033  Aargau
CH04 Zurich
CH040  Zürich
CH05 Eastern Switzerland
CH051  Glarus
CH052  Schaffhausen
CH053  Appenzell Ausserrhoden
CH054  Appenzell Innerrhoden
CH055  St. Gallen
CH056  Grisons
CH057  Thurgau
CH06 Central Switzerland
CH061  Lucerne
CH062  Uri
CH063  Schwyz
CH064  Obwalden
CH065  Nidwalden
CH066  Zug
CH07 Ticino
CH070  Ticino

Below the NUTS levels, there are two LAU levels (LAU-1: districts; LAU-2: municipalities).
